    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Ordföljd - ”inte” på rätt plats i meningen</string>
            <string language="en">Word - "not" in the right place in the sentence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wort - "nicht" im rechten Platz im Programmsatz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mot - "pas" dans le bon endroit dans la phrase</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Palavra - "não" no lugar direito na sentença</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parola - "non" nel giusto posto nella frase</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λέξη - "όχι" στη σωστή θέση στην πρόταση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Palabra - "no" en el lugar derecho en la 
sentencia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Här tränar vi på att sätta in ordet ”inte” på rätt plats i meningar.Modul 3 - Hur mår du? - Grammatik 3.Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">Here we train to put the word "not" in the right place in the sentences. Module 3 - How are you? - Grammar 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>
            <string language="sv">språk</string>
            <string language="sv">grammatik</string>
            <string language="sv">ordföljd</string>
            <string language="sv">inte</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">sfi</string>
            <string language="en">Swedish</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="en">word</string>
            <string language="en">not</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier bilden wir aus, um das Wort "nicht" in den 
rechten Platz in den Programmsätzen einzusetzen. Modul 3 - 
Wie geht es Ihnen? - Grammatik 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ici nous nous exerçons pour mettre le mot "pas" 
dans le bon endroit dans les phrases. Module 3 - Comment 
allez-vous ? - grammaire 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui nós treinamos para pôr a palavra "não" no
lugar direito nas sentenças. Módulo 3 - Como é você? 
- gramática 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui addestriamo per mettere la parola "non" nel 
giusto posto nelle frasi. Modulo 3 - Come siete? - 
grammatica 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ εκπαιδεύουμε να βάλουμε τη λέξη "όχι" στη σωστή 
θέση στις προτάσεις. Ενότητα 3 - πώς είστε; - 
Γραμματική 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí entrenamos para poner la palabra "no" en el
lugar derecho en las sentencias. Módulo 3 - ¿Cómo es 
usted? - gramática 3. Safir.</string>
          </description>
